messages.body: Week In Review: $AAPL Becomes First $1 Trillion Company https://www.briefing.com/investor/markets/weekly-wrap/weekly-wrap-for-july-30-2018.htm $FED $FB $TSLA #WeeklyWrap

links.title: Weekly Wrap for July 30, 2018
links.description: Stocks climbed this week as investors digested the Fed's latest policy directive and Apple's (AAPL) quarterly earnings report, which helped boost the company's market cap above the unprecedented $1 trillion mark. The S&P 500 advanced 0.8%, and the tech-heavy Nasdaq rose 1.0%. The Dow lagged though, adding just 0.1%.

links.title: Yay Capitalism
links.description: Apple's market capitalization breached $1T this week. I'm a bit sanguine, as I've been predicting, with enormous confidence, that Amazon would get there first. It's not easy to be wrong dozens of times, on national media, every week for three years, but I've managed.
